type.name: org.gradle.api.plugins.antlr.AntlrSourceVirtualDirectory
type.description: * Contract for a Gradle "convention object" that acts as a handler for what I call a virtual directory mapping, * injecting a virtual directory named 'antlr' into the project's various {@link org.gradle.api.tasks.SourceSet source * sets}.

method.description: * Configures the Antlr source for this set. The given closure is used to configure the {@link org.gradle.api.file.SourceDirectorySet} (see * {@link #getAntlr}) which contains the Antlr source. * * @param configureClosure The closure to use to configure the Antlr source. * @return this

method.description: * All Antlr source for this source set. * * @return The Antlr source. Never returns null.
